LanguageData.PS_BasicResearch.label: basic reconstruction
LanguageData.PS_BasicResearch.description:
Research into the most basic plastic surgery techniques.
Allows change of beauty from:
Increase- ugly to plain
Decrease- pretty down to ugly
LanguageData.PS_IntermediateResearch.label: intermediate reconstruction
LanguageData.PS_IntermediateResearch.description:
Research into intermediate plastic surgery techniques.
Allows change of beauty from:
Increase- ugly up to pretty
Decrease- beautiful down to staggeringly ugly
LanguageData.PS_AdvancedFacialResearch.label: advanced reconstruction
LanguageData.PS_AdvancedFacialResearch.description:
Research into the most advanced facial reconstruction surgery techniques.
Allows change of beauty from:
Increase- staggeringly ugly up to beautiful
Decrease- beautiful down to staggeringly ugly
LanguageData.PS_BodyModResearch.label: body modification
LanguageData.PS_BodyModResearch.description: Research into alteration of weight and physical build. Allows for changes to the patient's body type.
LanguageData.PS_SexModResearch.label: sex reassignment
LanguageData.PS_SexModResearch.description: Research into alteration of biological sex. Allows for sex change surgeries. This surgery is purely internal and does not affect appearances.
LanguageData.PS_Research_Laryngoplasty.label: laryngoplasty
LanguageData.PS_Research_Laryngoplasty.description: A laryngeal reconstruction surgery that is able to alter or restore a persons voice. Very useful for people who suffer from annoying voices, creepy breathing, or botched laryngoplasties.
LanguageData.PS_Research_ImmuneBoost.label: immunity boosting
LanguageData.PS_Research_ImmuneBoost.description: After a mishap involving confusing a vial of plasteel shaving for insulin, researchers discovered that the self sterilizing properties of plasteel take effect even while in the bloodstream. This lead to the development of an immune boosting procedure. Perfect for those who could best be described as sickly.
